[ Paradise Lost by John Milton 1667 ] Book I Of Man ' s first disobedience , and the fruit Of that forbidden tree whose mortal taste Brought death into the World , and all our woe.
[ The Parent ' s Assistant , by Maria Edgeworth ] THE ORPHANS . Near the ruins of the castle of Rossmore , in Ireland , is a small cabin , in which there once lived a widow and her four children .
